abstract: A big expansion, including new rides, planned for Hong Kong Disneyland.
snippet: A big expansion, including new rides, planned for Hong Kong Disneyland.
lead_paragraph: A substantial expansion aimed at increasing interest in Hong Kong Disneyland, rumored for months, became a reality on Tuesday with Chinese officials and the Walt Disney Company announcing new attractions that will cost about $500 million.

headline.main: Big Expansion, New Rides Planned for Hong Kong Disneyland
